localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

localize.title: Reddit 熱門
localize.description: 用中文瀏覽Reddit熱門內容

nodes.excerpt: Make boring meetings a thing of the past. Engage your audience and energize participants with live polls, quizzes, word clouds, Q&A's and new slide layouts. Creating an entire slide deck in Mentimeter has never been easier or more beautiful!
nodes.title: Mentimeter Layouts - Create interactive presentations that stands out.
nodes.author: Johannes Ridderstedt

localize.description: 让无聊的会议成为过去。通过现场投票、测验、文字云、问答和新的幻灯片布局，让您的听众参与进来，激发参与者的活力。在Mentimeter中创建一个完整的幻灯片从来没有如此简单或更漂亮
localize.tagline: 创建突出的交互式演示。

localize.description: 讓無聊的會議成爲過去。通過現場投票、測驗、文字雲、問答和新的幻燈片佈局，讓您的聽衆參與進來，激發參與者的活力。在Mentimeter中創建一個完整的幻燈片從來沒有如此簡單或更漂亮
localize.tagline: 創建突出的交互式演示。

nodes.excerpt: Think “Cards Against Humanity” meets Microsoft Paint. Now add an AI as the judge. Paint.wtf challenges you to draw your best on zany prompts and then be scored by an AI. See if you can rank atop the global leaderboard. A new prompt is released every 2 hours!
nodes.title: paint.wtf - A drawing game where an AI is the judge
nodes.author: Brad Dwyer

localize.description: 想想 "纸牌反人类 "与微软绘画的结合。现在添加一个AI作为裁判。Paint.wtf 挑战你在滑稽的提示上画出你最好的作品，然后由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小时发布一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一个人工智能作为裁判的绘画游戏

localize.description: 想想 "紙牌反人類 "與微軟繪畫的結合。現在添加一個AI作爲裁判。Paint.wtf 挑戰你在滑稽的提示上畫出你最好的作品，然後由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小時發佈一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一個人工智能作爲裁判的繪畫遊戲

nodes.excerpt: Beeper is fast. A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, you’ll never miss a message again.
nodes.title: Beeper - All of your chats in one app
nodes.author: Charlie Irish

localize.description: 哔哩哔哩速度快。一个应用就可以在iMessage、WhatsApp和其他13个网络上聊天。你可以搜索、静音或存档信息。有了统一的收件箱，你再也不会错过任何信息。
localize.tagline: 你的所有聊天记录都在一个应用程序中

localize.description: 嗶哩嗶哩速度快。一個應用就可以在iMessage、WhatsApp和其他13個網絡上聊天。你可以搜索、靜音或存檔信息。有了統一的收件箱，你再也不會錯過任何信息。
localize.tagline: 你的所有聊天記錄都在一個應用程序中

nodes.excerpt: Generate HTML code optimal for social media, SEO, mobile for your single-page app. This uses web standards from Open Graph (Facebook) and Twitter to provide optimal results. Also generates social media posts.
nodes.title: Meta Tag Generator - Generate HTML code optimal for SEO, social media, & mobile.
nodes.author: Lewis Nakao

localize.description: 为您的单页应用生成适合社交媒体、SEO、移动端的HTML代码。使用Open Graph (Facebook)和Twitter的网络标准，提供最佳效果。还可以生成社交媒体帖子。
localize.tagline: 生成最适合SEO、社交媒体和手机的HTML代码。

localize.description: 爲您的單頁應用生成適合社交媒體、SEO、移動端的HTML代碼。使用Open Graph (Facebook)和Twitter的網絡標準，提供最佳效果。還可以生成社交媒體帖子。
localize.tagline: 生成最適合SEO、社交媒體和手機的HTML代碼。

nodes.excerpt: Pillow is the best sleep tracker app for your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad to help you uncover the scientifically proven benefits of good sleep. Version 4.0 is a complete redesign and rewrite of the app, brining many new features and improvements.
nodes.title: Pillow 4.0 - Sleeping better, made simple
nodes.author: Panos S.

localize.description: Pillow是一款适用于您的Apple Watch、iPhone或iPad的最佳睡眠追踪器应用，帮助您发现科学证明的良好睡眠的好处。4.0版本是一个完整的重新设计和重写的应用程序，带来了许多新的功能和改进。
localize.tagline: 睡眠更好，更简单

localize.description: Pillow是一款適用於您的Apple Watch、iPhone或iPad的最佳睡眠追蹤器應用，幫助您發現科學證明的良好睡眠的好處。4.0版本是一個完整的重新設計和重寫的應用程序，帶來了許多新的功能和改進。
localize.tagline: 睡眠更好，更簡單

nodes.excerpt: There's an abundance of sources available for hearing the trending, breaking news updates. We keep you informed on the stories that don't make it to the front page, for free.
nodes.title: Below the Fold - News you aren’t hearing anywhere else
nodes.author: Anum Hussain

localize.description: 有丰富的消息来源，可以听到最新的趋势，突发新闻。我们让你了解那些没有上头版的故事，免费的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方听不到的新闻

localize.description: 有豐富的消息來源，可以聽到最新的趨勢，突發新聞。我們讓你瞭解那些沒有上頭版的故事，免費的。
localize.tagline: 你在其他地方聽不到的新聞

nodes.excerpt: Stop wasting time to recreate the same things to manage your projects every time. With Notion PM you have everything already done: document binder, contacts, stages, roadmap, tasks, and page templates. One-click. 3 different styles with more than 200 assets.
nodes.title: Notion PM - The perfect workspace to manage projects with your clients
nodes.author: Vincenzo Di Cosmo

localize.description: 不要再浪费时间去重新创建同样的东西来管理你的项目。有了Notion PM，你已经拥有了一切：文件夹、联系人、阶段、路线图、任务和页面模板。一键式。3种不同的风格，200多种资产。
localize.tagline: 与客户一起管理项目的完美工作空间。

localize.description: 不要再浪費時間去重新創建同樣的東西來管理你的項目。有了Notion PM，你已經擁有了一切：文件夾、聯繫人、階段、路線圖、任務和頁面模板。一鍵式。3種不同的風格，200多種資產。
localize.tagline: 與客戶一起管理項目的完美工作空間。

nodes.excerpt: Mibo is videochat made for informal meetings, remote drinks, social mixers, networking events, or just hanging out with your team. In Mibo, you decide what conversations to join and where to hang out. Mibo feels like being together. Just like real life.
nodes.title: Mibo - Videoconferencing that feels like real life
nodes.author: Taco Ekkel

localize.description: Mibo是为非正式会议、远程酒会、社交聚会、网络活动或只是与你的团队一起闲逛而设计的视频聊天软件。在Mibo中，您可以决定加入什么对话和在哪里闲逛。Mibo感觉就像在一起。就像现实生活一样。
localize.tagline: 宛如真实生活的视频会议

localize.description: Mibo是爲非正式會議、遠程酒會、社交聚會、網絡活動或只是與你的團隊一起閒逛而設計的視頻聊天軟件。在Mibo中，您可以決定加入什麼對話和在哪裏閒逛。Mibo感覺就像在一起。就像現實生活一樣。
localize.tagline: 宛如真實生活的視頻會議

nodes.excerpt: A digital dashboard to concisely track the fulfillment of President Biden's promises for the first 100 days.
nodes.title: Track Biden - Track Biden's first 100 Days
nodes.author: Amr Sobhy

localize.description: 一个数字仪表盘，简明扼要地跟踪拜登总统前100天的承诺履行情况。

localize.description: 一個數字儀表盤，簡明扼要地跟蹤拜登總統前100天的承諾履行情況。
localize.tagline: 追蹤拜登的第一個100天

nodes.excerpt: Expand your skills as an artist with daily art challenges. Categories include drawing, photography, painting, and typography. The best way to improve is daily practice. Challenge yourself and your friends to create something new every day with Creact!
nodes.title: Creact - Daily art & drawing challenges to improve your art skills
nodes.author: Brian Hulme

localize.description: 通过每天的艺术挑战来扩展你作为一个艺术家的技能。类别包括绘画、摄影、绘画和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天练习。通过Creact！挑战你和你的朋友，每天创造新的东西。
localize.tagline: 每天的艺术和绘画挑战，提高你的艺术技能。

localize.description: 通過每天的藝術挑戰來擴展你作爲一個藝術家的技能。類別包括繪畫、攝影、繪畫和排版。提高技能的最好方法就是每天練習。通過Creact！挑戰你和你的朋友，每天創造新的東西。
localize.tagline: 每天的藝術和繪畫挑戰，提高你的藝術技能。

nodes.excerpt: Agree is a shared voting app to help you come to a joint decision with friends and colleagues. Create and share polls, and simply swipe right to vote yes and left for no. Winning options pop up as a notification once everyone has voted.
nodes.title: Agree - Polls with friends
nodes.author: JPEGuin

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票应用，帮助你与朋友和同事达成共同的决定。创建和分享投票，只需向右滑动投赞成票，向左滑动投反对票。一旦大家都投了票，获胜的选项就会以通知的形式弹出。
localize.tagline: 与朋友一起投票

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票應用，幫助你與朋友和同事達成共同的決定。創建和分享投票，只需向右滑動投贊成票，向左滑動投反對票。一旦大家都投了票，獲勝的選項就會以通知的形式彈出。
localize.tagline: 與朋友一起投票

nodes.excerpt: Create compelling video ads and marketing videos in the palm of your hand. Produce top-quality content designed specifically for business within minutes, even if you’ve never made a video before.
nodes.title: AdDirector - Make marketing videos in minutes on your phone
nodes.author: kevin chang

localize.description: 在您的手掌中创建引人注目的视频广告和营销视频。即使您从未制作过视频，也能在几分钟内制作出专门为企业设计的高质量内容。
localize.tagline: 在手机上几分钟内制作营销视频

localize.description: 在您的手掌中創建引人注目的視頻廣告和營銷視頻。即使您從未製作過視頻，也能在幾分鐘內製作出專門爲企業設計的高質量內容。
localize.tagline: 在手機上幾分鐘內製作營銷視頻

nodes.excerpt: Trainn helps SaaS companies accelerate product adoption with product walkthrough videos and training academies for users. With better product education leads to better onboarding and decreases time to value of your product leading to higher retention.
nodes.title: Trainn - A new way to create professional product walkthrough videos.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Trainn帮助SaaS公司通过产品演练视频和用户培训学院来加速产品的应用。通过更好的产品教育，使用户更好地入职，减少产品价值的时间，从而提高用户的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一种全新的方式来制作专业的产品演练视频。

localize.description: Trainn幫助SaaS公司通過產品演練視頻和用戶培訓學院來加速產品的應用。通過更好的產品教育，使用戶更好地入職，減少產品價值的時間，從而提高用戶的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一種全新的方式來製作專業的產品演練視頻。

nodes.excerpt: Earn more revenue from your app or site without showing ads (OR) placing more ads AudiencePlay converts every user footprint into audiences and shares it with brands to unlock an alternative revenue stream Secure + ISO27001 Certified + Privacy Complaint
nodes.title: AudiencePlay - Free monetization platform for websites and apps
nodes.author: Raghu KLN

localize.description: 从您的应用程序或网站赚取更多的收入，而不显示广告（或）放置更多的广告AudiencePlay将每一个用户足迹转化为受众，并将其与品牌共享，以解锁另一种收入来源安全+ISO27001认证+隐私投诉。

nodes.excerpt: Dreambook is simply a database specially created for your dreams. Without thinking of limitation, save your dreams, analyze them. After you start using Dreambook, with the upcoming features and updates you will have more than you expect from your dreams.
nodes.title: Dreambook - Dream journal, interpreter and tracker
nodes.author: Ahmet Sülek

localize.description: 梦境簿只是一个专门为您的梦境建立的数据库。不考虑任何限制，保存你的梦境，分析它们。当您开始使用Dreambook后，随着即将到来的功能和更新，您将从您的梦想中获得更多的东西。
localize.tagline: 梦境日记、解释者和追踪者

nodes.excerpt: Universal widgets, charts and ready-to-use screens collected and coded. Get perfectly coded website or web-application with helpful tools included. Package includes HTML, CSS, JS code and Figma sources.

localize.tagline: 挑选亮点并将其转化为独立的视频 🍒。

nodes.excerpt: Work faster with parts suppliers from idea to production. Get instant quotes for your designs, source new verified suppliers around the world, get feedback directly from suppliers to avoid mistakes and produce even the most complex parts with minimum delays.

localize.description: 从创意到生产，与零部件供应商合作更快。为您的设计获取即时报价，在全球范围内寻找新的经过验证的供应商，直接从供应商处获得反馈，以避免错误，并以最少的延误生产最复杂的零件。

nodes.excerpt: An estimate 60% of small businesses closed down due to covid. Now more than ever they need your help. I created some tools and training to teach you how to build a local lead generation business to help out these businesses.

nodes.excerpt: Already trusted by companies like Cartier, Square, Conde Nast, and Signal Messaging, Mixer is a professional network empowering creatives to make the right connections, find jobs, and recruit top talent.
nodes.title: Mixer - The Creative Network - Make connections, find jobs, and recruit top creative talent
nodes.author: Anis Bennaceur

localize.description: Mixer已经受到卡地亚、Square、Conde Nast和Signal Messaging等公司的信任，它是一个专业的网络，帮助创意人建立正确的联系，找到工作，并招募顶尖人才。
localize.tagline: 建立联系，寻找工作，招聘顶级创意人才。

localize.description: Mixer已經受到卡地亞、Square、Conde Nast和Signal Messaging等公司的信任，它是一個專業的網絡，幫助創意人建立正確的聯繫，找到工作，並招募頂尖人才。
localize.tagline: 建立聯繫，尋找工作，招聘頂級創意人才。

nodes.excerpt: Integrate Willo async video interviews with your workflow and unlock productivity super powers. Connect over 2,000 applications with the help of Zapier and interview people without the hassle.
nodes.title: Zapier for Willo - Automate your hiring process with Zapier
nodes.author: Euan Cameron

localize.description: 将Willo异步视频面试与您的工作流程整合，释放生产力的超能力。在 Zapier 的帮助下，连接超过 2,000 个应用程序，并在没有麻烦的情况下对人们进行采访。
localize.tagline: 使用Zapier自动化您的招聘流程。

localize.description: 將Willo異步視頻面試與您的工作流程整合，釋放生產力的超能力。在 Zapier 的幫助下，連接超過 2,000 個應用程序，並在沒有麻煩的情況下對人們進行採訪。
localize.tagline: 使用Zapier自動化您的招聘流程。
